alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Aguadilla; Isabela; Lares; Moca; Quebradillas; San Sebastian (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 29 at 3:11PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including Aguada, Aguadilla, Isabela, Lares, Moca, Quebradillas and San Sebastian. * WHEN...Until 515 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 209 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Sebastian, Moca, Quebradillas, Isabela, Lares, Aguadilla, Aguada, Hato Arriba, Aceitunas, Luyando, Caban, San Antonio, Mora, Cacao, Juncal and Rafael Hernandez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Aguada; Aguadilla; Isabela; Lares; Moca; Quebradillas; San Sebastian
